ENONewDrawingHdr.Title: New Drawing
ENONewDrawingHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, the attributes if any, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click <uicontrol>Create and Close</uicontrol> to create only one drawing, or <uicontrol>Create</uicontrol> to create another one.
ENOInsertNewDrawingHdr.Title: Insert New Drawing
ENOInsertNewDrawingHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a new drawing and adds it as a child to the selected objects.
ENOInsertNewDrawingHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, enter a title, and optionally select a template to choose the CAD master. Click Create and Close to create only one drawing, or Create to create another one.
